Create a makeshift shelter using natural materials such as leaves, branches, and grass to protect yourself from the sun, wind, and rain.
Use body heat to stay warm by wearing layers of clothing or wrapping yourself in blankets.
Use your clothing as a makeshift blanket or insulation to stay warm in cold weather.
Use natural materials such as rocks or branches to create a fire to keep warm and cook food.
Use natural materials such as leaves, grass, or bark to create a makeshift clothing such as a tunic or jacket.
